decks.notes: This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with cards like Ugin's Labyrinth, Eldrazi Temple, and Utopia Sprawl to play powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. It also includes disruptive spells like Kozilek's Command and Kozilek's Return to control the board. Karn, the Great Creator is used to search for artifacts that can further disrupt the opponent's game plan. Malevolent Rumble and Sowing Mycospawn serve as removal and token generation, while Writhing Chrysalis provides additional threats. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big creatures and disruption.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with aggressive creatures and burn spells. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer provide early pressure, while Guide of Souls and Ocelot Pride boost the team's power. Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury acts as a powerful finisher, while cards like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment provide additional reach. The deck also includes disruption in the form of Static Prison and Thraben Charm to help control the board. With efficient creatures and burn spells, this deck aims to quickly close out games before the opponent can stabilize.

The deck focuses on utilizing Underworld Breach to repeatedly recur cheap artifacts and spells from the graveyard, allowing for a powerful combo finish. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provide card advantage and recursion, while cards like Mishra's Bauble and Mox Opal help with mana acceleration. The deck aims to set up a loop where Grinding Station mills the opponent's library, then uses Thassa's Oracle or Malevolent Rumble to win the game. Overall, the deck is built around creating a powerful and efficient combo engine to overwhelm the opponent.

This Control - Elementals deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy while generating incremental value through cards like Wrenn and Six, Risen Reef, and Omnath, Locus of Creation. The deck utilizes removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Prismatic Ending to control the board, while also leveraging powerful Elemental creatures like Solitude and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury for both defense and offense. The mana base is designed to support a wide range of colors needed for the deck's spells and creatures, with additional lands like Dryad Arbor and Xander's Lounge providing extra utility.
